title: Levayos Held in Lakewood
body: Rabbi Shlomo Abba Kohn and Chaim Simcha Grossman's levayos will be held at Lakewood High School in New Jersey. Rabbi Shlomo Abba Kohn's levayah is at 3:30 p.m. and Chaim Simcha Grossman's is at 5:15 p.m. Watch the levayos online.

title: Four Yeshiva Students Killed
body: Four yeshiva bochurim died in a crash on the New Jersey Turnpike after a suspected drunk driver slammed into their vehicle near Carneys Point Township early Sunday morning.
